Articles.Content: I hope someday we will be able to experience such a gaming experience in KSP2 without installing a huge amount of mods, as was necessary in KSP1
What about the blocky terrain? Leave Kerbin and no amount of weird spawned assets is going to help with the fact that the ground is made of huge rectangles.
Looks like this is meant as a suggestion/hope for the eventual state of the game? Thread moved to Suggestions & Development.
